column4: i am trying to install ubuntu server and the install program cannot find the dchp server, i tried switching the ethernet cards and i still have no luck. dmesg shows that ubuntu sees eth0 is ADMtek comet, but i'm using a linksys etherfast
how can i get the ethernet card to work?
are you using dhcp on your network?
skip the network setup installation step if it does not work, and work on getting the card set up after you install.
